/** * Title: home.component.ts * Author: Jocelyn Dupuis * Date: 01/18/2024 * Description: ts file for home component */ // imports statements import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) //exports export class HomeComponent { }

Welcome to the Ravenclaw Task Manager - Nodebucket!

A task manager app inspired by the best Harry Potter House: Ravenclaw.

Nodebucket is a task manager application that lets you plan, organize, and prioritize all your tasks so that you can complete them efficiently and effectively. Achieving goals and completing projects will be a breeze with this tool for all individuals, teams, and companies. Nodebucket will help

Source: Rijgar Aur Nirman
